metadata.name: w3swap
metadata.description: W3Swap Migration Platform - Secure token migration on Solana with Token-2022 support

docs: A secure token migration platform on Solana that enables:
- Secure token swaps with admin controls
- Optional migration protection with SOL commitments
- Multi-role access control (Super Admin, Project Admins)

instructions.name: activate_project
docs: Activate a project for migrations and create initial LP

instructions.name: close_project_accounts
docs: Finalize project step 2: close remaining accounts and reclaim rent

accounts.name: new_token_program
docs: Token program interfaces (used to close token accounts via CPI)

instructions.name: complete_settlement
docs: Complete settlement and start LP lockup period

instructions.name: create_project_init
docs: Create project (step 1): initialize account and fields

instructions.name: create_project_vaults
docs: Create project (step 2): initialize vaults + fund SOL commitment

accounts.name: payer
docs: Payer for any required ATA creations off-chain (not used here but kept for future)

instructions.name: finalize_project_transfers
docs: Finalize project step 1: transfer LP/new tokens out and close LP escrow

instructions.name: finalize_settlement
docs: Finalize settlement: skim fee and add remaining WSOL to LP

accounts.name: fee_destination_token_account
docs: Fee destination WSOL token account (should be ATA of fee_destination_wallet)

instructions.name: fund_project
docs: Fund a project with new tokens

instructions.name: initialize_platform
docs: Initialize the platform with super admin

instructions.name: migrate
docs: Migrate old tokens for new tokens

errors.name: AllowedSwapProgramsListFull
errors.msg: Allowed swap programs list is full

errors.name: InvalidMigrationDuration
errors.msg: Invalid migration duration (must be exactly 30, 60, or 90 days)

errors.name: InsufficientSolCommitment
errors.msg: SOL commitment is below platform minimum

errors.name: ProjectNotReady
errors.msg: Project cannot be activated before start time

errors.name: InsufficientVaultBalanceToResume
errors.msg: Vault balance too low to resume - please top up vault

types.name: AdminAction
docs: Admin action for managing project admins

types.name: CreateProjectParams
docs: Parameters for creating a new project

fields.name: old_token_mint
docs: Old token mint to migrate from

fields.name: new_token_mint
docs: New token mint to migrate to

fields.name: sol_commitment_amount
docs: SOL commitment amount for LP creation (in lamports)

fields.name: special_ratio_enabled
docs: Enable special ratio for certain wallets

fields.name: special_ratio_wallets
docs: Wallets that get special exchange ratio

types.name: LpConfiguration
docs: LP Configuration for initial liquidity creation

fields.name: initial_price
docs: Initial price for new token (in SOL per token)

fields.name: token_allocation
docs: Amount of new tokens to allocate for LP

fields.name: bin_step
docs: Meteora bin step (price precision in basis points)

fields.name: base_fee
docs: Base trading fee in basis points

fields.name: super_admin
docs: Super admin who can manage everything

fields.name: project_admins
docs: List of project admins who can create projects

fields.name: min_sol_commitment
docs: Minimum SOL commitment required for LP creation (in lamports)

fields.name: auto_pause_threshold_percent
docs: Auto-pause threshold percentage (e.g., 10 = 10% of one token)

fields.name: platform_fee_lamports
docs: Platform fee charged (in lamports). Configured via a simple SOL integer input

fields.name: settlement_fee_percent
docs: Settlement fee in whole percent (0-100). For example, 1 = 1%.

fields.name: min_migration_days
docs: Minimum migration duration in days (simple input)

fields.name: max_migration_days
docs: Maximum migration duration in days (simple input)

fields.name: min_lp_lock_days
docs: Minimum LP lock duration in days (simple input)

fields.name: project_admin
docs: Admin who created and manages this project

fields.name: old_token_mint
docs: Old token mint to migrate from

fields.name: new_token_mint
docs: New token mint to migrate to

fields.name: old_token_program
docs: Token program for old token (SPL or Token-2022)

fields.name: new_token_program
docs: Token program for new token (SPL or Token-2022)

fields.name: new_token_vault
docs: Vault holding new tokens for distribution

fields.name: liquidity_vault
docs: Vault holding SOL/WSOL commitment for LP

fields.name: wsol_vault
docs: Vault holding WSOL proceeds from swaps

fields.name: migration_duration
docs: Migration duration in seconds (as specified by admin)

fields.name: last_pause_start
docs: Last pause timestamp (0 if not paused)

fields.name: activated_at
docs: Actual activation timestamp (when project became active)

fields.name: auto_pause_threshold_percent
docs: Auto-pause threshold percent copied from platform at creation

fields.name: meteora_pool
docs: Meteora LP pool address (created at activation)

fields.name: lp_config
docs: LP configuration used for pool creation

fields.name: special_ratio_enabled
docs: Special ratio enabled for certain wallets

fields.name: special_ratio_wallets
docs: Special ratio wallets (who get special exchange rate)

fields.name: allowlist
docs: Allow list entries (only allocated if enabled)

fields.name: denylist
docs: Deny list entries (only allocated if enabled)

types.name: ProjectFinalized
docs: Project finalized event (after lockup - admin claims LP tokens)

types.name: SettlementCompleted
docs: Settlement completed event (LP created and lockup starts)

fields.name: old_tokens_migrated
docs: Total old tokens migrated by user

fields.name: new_tokens_received
docs: Total new tokens received by user
